text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to play a warlock on world of warcraft?
text.Response A: Sure, here are some tips.  First, you’ll want to cover the walls and ceiling with a base coat of white or off-white paint.  Next, you can add some accents in other colors.  For example, you could paint a border of flowers along the ceiling, or add a few polka dots or stripes on the walls.  You might also want to add some decorative details like a picture frame or a shelf.  Finally, you'll want to give the room a fresh coat of paint every few years to keep it looking good.
text.Response B:
Sure, I can help you!  A warlock is a class in the game World of Warcraft, and it’s a powerful class that focuses on casting spells.  Here are some tips for playing the warlock class:
-Get the most out of your spell damage by using the right abilities at the right times.
-Keep track of your cooldowns, and use them wisely to maximize your damage output.
-Try to keep up Shadowfury, your constant damage-over-time ability, at all times.
-Build your talents and spells to focus on increasing your damage and survivability.
-Learn how to use your demonic summons to help you fight, by attacking enemies or providing utility

meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

444.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to play a warlock on world of warcraft?

Response A

Sure, here are some tips. First, you’ll want to cover the walls and ceiling with a base coat of white or off-white paint. Next, you can add some accents in other colors. For example, you could paint a border of flowers along the ceiling, or add a few polka dots or stripes on the walls. You might also want to add some decorative details like a picture frame or a shelf. Finally, you'll want to give the room a fresh coat of paint every few years to keep it looking good.

Response B

Sure, I can help you! A warlock is a class in the game World of Warcraft, and it’s a powerful class that focuses on casting spells. Here are some tips for playing the warlock class:
-Get the most out of your spell damage by using the right abilities at the right times.
-Keep track of your cooldowns, and use them wisely to maximize your damage output.
-Try to keep up Shadowfury, your constant damage-over-time ability, at all times.
-Build your talents and spells to focus on increasing your damage and survivability.
-Learn how to use your demonic summons to help you fight, by attacking enemies or providing utility
